data.enText: to say sth officially or publicly

data.chText: 政府已宣布进入紧急状态。
data.enText: The government has declared a state of emergency.

data.chText: 德国在1914年8月1日向法国宣战。
data.enText: Germany declared war on France on 1 August 1914.

data.chText: 政府已宣布要扫除文盲。
data.enText: The government has declared war on (= officially stated its intention to stop) illiteracy.
The court declared that strike action was illegal.

data.chText: 该地区已宣布为国家公园。

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+名词短语

data.enText: The area has been declared a national park.

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+带to的不定式

data.enText: The painting was declared to be a forgery.
The contract was declared void.
I declare this bridge open.
to state sth firmly and clearly
‘I'll do it!’ Tom declared.
He declared that he was in love with her.

data.chText: 很少有人敢宣称他们反对这个政权。
data.enText: Few people dared to declare their opposition to the regime.

data.chText: 她说自己非常伤心，因为他没有得到支持。
data.enText: She declared herself extremely hurt by his lack of support.

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+名词短语

data.enText: to tell the tax authorities how much money you have earned
All income must be declared.
to tell customs officers (= at the border of a country) that you are carrying goods on which you should pay tax
Do you have anything to declare?

data.chText: （在击球员还未全部出局时）宣布结束赛局，宣布停止击球
data.enText: to decide to end your innings (= the period during which your team is batting ) before all your players have batted
declare against sb/sth
to say publicly that you do not support sb/sth
declare for sb/sth
to say publicly that you support sb/sth

data.chText: 以上各词均含表明、宣称、宣布之义。
data.enText: These words all mean to say sth, usually firmly and clearly and often in public.
declare
( rather formal ) to say sth officially or publicly; to state sth firmly and clearly
to declare war
The painting was declared to be a forgery.
state
( rather formal ) to formally write or say sth, especially in a careful and clear way

data.chText: 他已声明打算参加竞选。
data.enText: He has already stated his intention to run for election.
indicate
( rather formal ) to state sth, sometimes in a way that is slightly indirect

data.chText: 在我们会晤期间，他提及了合作的意愿。
data.enText: During our meeting, he indicated his willingness to cooperate.
announce

data.chText: 指宣布、宣告、（通过广播）通知：
data.enText: to tell people officially about a decision or plans; to give information about sth in a public place, especially through a loudspeaker; to say sth in a loud and/or serious way

data.chText: 他们还没有正式宣布订婚。
data.enText: They haven't formally announced their engagement yet.

data.chText: 广播通知了我们的航班没有？
data.enText: Has our flight been announced yet?

data.chText: declare较常用于表明意见、看法；announce较常用于说明事实：
data.enText: Declare is used more often for giving judgements; announce is used more often for giving facts.
The painting was announced to be a forgery.
They haven't formally declared their engagement yet.
declare or announce?
to declare/state/indicate/announce that…
to declare/state sb/sth to be sth
to declare/state/indicate/announce your intention to do sth
to declare/state/announce sth formally/publicly/officially
to declare/state/announce sth firmly/clearly/plainly

word_means: 宣布结束赛局，宣布停止击球
simple_means.memory_skill: de 使…加强 + clar 清楚 + e → 大声澄清〔事实〕→ 声明

means: 宣布结束赛局，宣布停止击球

ex.chText: 该政府已宣布进入紧急状态。
ex.enText: The government has declared a state of emergency.

ex.chText: 美国政府于1941年对日本宣战。
ex.enText: The US administration declared war on Japan in 1941.

synonyms.bx: 指公开而郑重地宣布某事，通常用于正式场合。

ex.chText: 政府宣布在海底发现了另一个大油田。
ex.enText: The government announced the discovery of another large oilfield at the bottom of the sea.

ex.chText: 杰克和苏珊宣布他们下周六结婚。
ex.enText: Jack and Susan announced that they would get married the next Saturday.

synonyms.bx: 通常用于正式宣布消息、决定、计划等。

ex.enText: He claimed that he owned the house.
She claimed to have seen me crying.

ex.chText: 该组织声称对这一事件负责。
ex.enText: The group claimed responsibility for the event.

synonyms.bx: 指声称拥有某物、某事属实、对某事负责。

ex.enText: The President proclaimed the independence of the Republic of South Sudan.

ex.chText: 年轻的公主后来被宣布为女王。
ex.enText: The young princess was later proclaimed queen.

synonyms.bx: 指官方宣布重大政治事件，如国家独立、国王等的即位。

ex.chText: 下个月将颁布新的交通法规。
ex.enText: New traffic rules will be published next month.

ex.chText: 最新的就业数据将于明早公布。
ex.enText: The latest employment figures will be published tomorrow morning.

synonyms.bx: 通常用被动语态，指通过报刊或其他媒介向公众公布信息。

data.enText: declare against sb/sth
to say publicly that you do not support sb/sth
declare for sb/sth
to say publicly that you support sb/sth

example: He declared that he was innocent
judge held that the defendant was innocent

tr: proclaim one's support, sympathy, or opinion for or against
example: His wife declared at once for moving to the West Coast
He declared that he needed more money to carry out the task he was charged with

tr: make a declaration (of dutiable goods) to a customs official
example: Do you have anything to declare?

tr: designate (a trump suit or no-trump) with the final bid of a hand

value.def: If you declare that something is true, you say that it is true in a firm, deliberate way. You can also declare an attitude or intention.

example.ex: Speaking outside Ten Downing Street, she declared that she would fight on...
example.tran: 她在英国首相官邸外发表讲话时宣称她将继续斗争下去。

example.ex: 'I'm absolutely thrilled to have done what I've done,' he declared...
example.tran: 他宣称道：“我为自己的所作所为感到兴奋不已。”

example.ex: He declared his intention to become the best golfer in the world...
example.tran: 他表明自己想要成为世界上最好的高尔夫球选手。

example.ex: Glasses of Madeira wine were brought to us. We declared it delicious...
example.tran: 端来了几杯马德拉白葡萄酒，我们一致认为它的味道好极了。

example.ex: He turned up in northern Cyprus, declaring himself happy to be home.
example.tran: 他出现在塞浦路斯北部，声称自己很高兴又回家了。

gramarinfo.label: Also V n n, V n to-inf

value.tran: 宣称，声称（…为事实）；表明(态度、意图等)

value.def: If you declare something, you state officially and formally that it exists or is the case.

example.ex: The government is ready to declare a permanent ceasefire...
example.tran: 政府准备宣布永久性停火。

example.ex: His lawyers are confident that the judges will declare Mr Stevens innocent...
example.tran: 史蒂文斯先生的律师们确信法官将宣告他无罪。

example.ex: The U.N. has declared it to be a safe zone...
example.tran: 联合国已宣布它为安全区。

example.ex: On striking his sword on the stone, he declared himself Lord of the City...
example.tran: 在以剑身击石之后，他宣布自己为“城之主宰”。

example.ex: You may have to declare that you have had an HIV test.
example.tran: 你可能需要声明自己已经做过艾滋病病毒检测。

value.def: If you declare goods that you have bought in another country or money that you have earned, you say how much you have bought or earned so that you can pay tax on it.

example.ex: Your income must be declared on this form...
example.tran: 必须在这张表格上申报你的收入。

example.ex: She had nothing to declare, and was starting to go through the 'Green' channel when she was stopped.
example.tran: 她没有什么要申报的，便开始进入绿色通道，结果就在这时被拦住了。

trans: 表态；显露身份；显露身分；表明态度；求婚；发表意见
宣告作罢（作废），取消（约定等）

rootsaffixes.indicate: = clear, bright 清楚的, 明白的
rootsaffixes.title: clear, clar, clair

partsOfSpeech.dec: clar 清楚的，明白的 + ification …化 → 澄清；纯化
clar 清楚的，明白的 + ify 使… → 澄清；阐明
clar 清楚的，明白的 + ity 具备某种性质，状况 → 清澈；清晰
clear 清楚的，明白的 + ance 表性质 → 清算；清除
de 加强 + clar 清楚的，明白的 + ation 行为，过程，状态，结果 → 强调清楚 → 宣言
de 加强 + clar 清楚的，明白的 + e → 宣称；断言
de 去掉；取消；毁 + code 密码 → 去掉密码 → 破译
de 去掉；取消；毁 + colour 颜色 → 去色
de 去掉；取消；毁 + control 控制 → 解除控制（或管制）
de 去掉；取消；毁 + face 脸面 → 把脸面弄坏 → 丑化
de 去掉；取消；毁 + fame 名声 → 毁掉名声 → 诽谤
de 去掉；取消；毁 + forest 森林 → 毁掉森林 → 砍伐森林
de 去掉；取消；毁 + hydr 水 + ate 使… → 去掉水 → 脱水
de 去掉；取消；毁 + salt 盐 → 除去盐分
de 否定，非；相反 + activate 使活动 → 使不再活动 → 遣散；使无效
de 否定，非；相反 + centralize 集中 → 不集中 → 分散
de 否定，非；相反 + compose 组成 → 不让组成在一起 → 分解
de 否定，非；相反 + materialize 物质化 → 非物质化
de 否定，非；相反 + militarize 军事化 → 非军事化
de 否定，非；相反 + mobilize 动员入伍 → 退伍 → 复员
de 否定，非；相反 + nationalize 国有化 → 使非国有化
de 否定，非；相反 + struct 建造 + ion 表动作 → 不建造反而破坏 → 破坏
de 向下；降低，减少 + celer 速度 + ate 做，造成，使… → 减速
de 向下；降低，减少 + class 社会等级 → 降低社会地位
de 向下；降低，减少 + population 人口 → 人口减少
de 向下；降低，减少 + press 压 →〔把心情〕向下压 → 压抑
de 向下；降低，减少 + value 价值 → 减少价值 → 贬值
de 离开 + plane 飞机 → 下飞机
de 离开 + rail 铁轨 → 使（火车）出轨
de 离开 + throne 王位 → 退位
de 离开 + train 火车 → 下火车
de 使…加强 + bar 阻拦 → 阻止，禁止
de 使…加强 + claim 呼喊 → 大声呼喊 → 讲话；演讲
de 使…加强 + clar 清楚 + e → 大声澄清〔事实〕→ 声明
de 使…加强 + fin 界限 + ition 行为，状态，结果，由行为产生的事物 → 划出界限 → 定义
de 使…加强 + limit 限定 → 加强限定 → 划定界限
de 使…加强 + line 直线，线条 + ate 使… → 勾勒线条 → 描绘
de 使…加强 + nude 裸的 → 使裸露
de 使…加强 + pict 画，描绘 → 描绘
de 使…加强 + sign 做记号 → 设计
